alert.note: Alert for Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 20 at 1:46AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The Bismarck and Mandan area. * WHEN...Until 330 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 145 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bismarck and Mandan. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
